edu.montgomerycollege.cmsc204.jkartchner

Class Test

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.montgomerycollege.cmsc204.jkartchner.Test
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSTest

    public abstract class Test
extends java.lang.Object
    Test holds all questions and answers for a test Methods to check if answer is correct, get next question, and check the percent of correct answers
